name: MathMeister: How Fast Can You Calculate?
name_original: MathMeister: How Fast Can You Calculate?
description: MathMeister: How Fast Can You Calculate? is a game where you drag number blocks and operation blocks in order to reach closer and closer to the goal number. In the time trial mode, you attempt to reach the goal number as quickly as possible, but there's more! In the 4 different challenge modes, the normal formula will be put through a spin to create different ways to play! Can you get through them all? Play the game to find out!
